name: Cavon
description:
Cavon is a 3D rogue-lite dungeon crawler with a cute and a slight retro theme and look to it, but with gameplay that has been refined to give players just as much of an experience as modern games.

Check out our webpage

https://cavon.vercel.app/


[SCHOOL PROJECT]

This project is a school project and is therefore not finished. There might (will) be bugs, so if you try out the game, please write feedback in the comments.
